review: Let me say that we are truly Amazon fans and supporters. But, not being able to mirror the fire TV was so disappointing. We have 3 kindles, one of which is a fire edition, and none of which can mirror!! We r not going to buy a fire phone or a new kindle. We will be purchasing an Apple TV until we can get the kindle that will work with the fire TV! But with all of that said, we LOVE Amazon.com and the Amazon products. We are prime members and always will be!! Love uou guys!

review: We decided to cut the cable cord and this has done just thatAlthough you still have to get the apps for whatever you want, its still better than cable.Went from a Chromecast to this and I have to say Fire TV is much better. You can still download an app to cast whatever you want to it, but this functions much better and operates much faster than Chromcast.Able to get all the major television programs on call for relatively cheap and if you're a Prime member (I am) you get access to a lot of free content.
